channel.title: Ems-scape where dreams comes true
channel.description:
Ems-Scape is a 317 Server loading 562/602 Maps and other aspects. Here at Ems-Scape we strive to provide each player with a pleasant and enjoyable stay, through our dedicated host and staff team. Ems-Scape constantly goes through new updates to ensure that the players are always kept entertained with new content. As the owner of Ems-Scape, I am completely dedicated to making the most enjoyable experience possible for each and every player, and as our motto says “Ems-Scape is made by the players, for the players”, and we strive to uphold that motto every day.
Server Management: H20 – Main Owner Infinity – Co-Owner/Developer
Links: Home: http://ems-scape.com/home Forums: http://ems-scape.com/forums Download: http://ems-scape.com/home/ClientDL/Ems-Scape.jar
Server Features: ut it is your choice. Main Features: Fully working "Buy X" and "Sell X" Fully working curses Fully working spell books with correct animations Player owned shops fully working Custom Dungeoneering System All skills working Custom quest tab Fully working XP Counter Fully working Money Pouch Fully working emotes Plenty of bosses to fight Fully working slayer system Auto-Join clan chat on login Chaotics/Nex sets/Primal equipment 5 Fully Mini games A more fun skilling system 24/7 Uptime - VPS Hosted - NO LAG! Daily updates Great Economy Dedicated staff/owner Great community [img]http://i.imgur.com/EiU1QLa.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CxrNIVd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cCglgg2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1xcaLFc.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/srH1JVM.png[/img]

item.title: Ems-scape where dreams comes true
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
@Mr.Draconian wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:6, topic:551071”][quote author=Titanium_ link=topic=669985.msg4480109#msg4480109 date=1429019200]
Sad… Forget the name. The original is closed. Let it stay that way. It gets really annoying when people take popular server names in hopes to get theirs popular.

Anyways best of luck I guess.
[/quote]
The original opened up under another domain… I assumed it was because of Jagex.[/quote]

Soul, Emps opened under a new name cuz Jagex started a domain redirection that when you go to emps-scape.net you go to runescape.com

Read full topic
